titleInfo.title: Letter No. 49 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses administrative issues and also mentions honours conferred upon Soliman Bacha [Suleiman Pasha]. The letter reports news from Persia that Ally Morad Cahn [Ali Murad Khan] has now broken his allegiance with Sadoo Cahn [Sadiq Khan] and is waiting until winter ends to approach Schyras [Shiraz] with his forces. Shipped by the Ranger.
